ygData.subject: Re: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail sister! After weighing the options of many of the magical weapons out there and the cost/return value of each, I decided to spend the money on two combine
ygData.messageBody:
Hail sister!

After weighing the options of many of the magical weapons out there and the
cost/return value of each, I decided to spend the money on two combine
longswords right now (I am level 18). A surprise benefit I found last
night: I can slam creatures that are immune to normal weapons. I couldn't
do this before when wielding only one combine sword (and I don't have any
magical bracers, wristbands, or gloves). I notice every so often I will hit
for 14 as well (combines are 6*2 + 1 supposedly, but I do get an extra now
and then). The biggest reason I decided to purchase is combine longswords
is the return value. I paid 54.3 plat for each of them, and I can come
close to getting that back by selling to another player. No other magical
weapon has a higher return (unless you get them yourself).

Angarth, Warrior of the 18th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"


> ----------
> From: Patricia Halas[SMTP:patty_halas@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com

> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Magical Weapon
>
> From: Patricia Halas <patty_halas@...>
>
> I am currently in HH collecting extra ringmail to sell in Halas so I can
> have enough money to buy a combine longsword but it is getting so boring.
> I
> have nevered seen that named gnoll fellow even though I spend most of my
> time hunting gnolls. At any rate, it there a better place for a level 17
> Warrior to get herself a magic weapon then HH (or saving up plat for a
> combine sword).
>
>
>
